name: Murphy

topics.topic_text: Steal your secrets? Not at all.
topics.response_text: Good. I was afraid I was gonna have to abandon my lab here. That would mean starting all over again.
The secret of making Ultrajet obviously!

topics.topic_text: Yeah sure, I'm here for everything you got. Hand it over, zombie!
topics.response_text: No! No way! You're not taking the formula from me!

topics.topic_text: Ultrajet? That some sort of super chem?
topics.response_text: I suppose you could say that. Ultrajet is almost double the potency of Jet... perfect for Ghouls. Jet barely affects us you see.

topics.topic_text: What the heck are you talking about?
topics.response_text: You never heard of it? Ultrajet is almost double the potency of Jet... perfect for Ghouls. Jet barely affects us you see.

topics.topic_text: Stop trying to talk your way out of this, zombie!
topics.response_text: What the hell is your problem? Fine! You're gonna be like that...

topics.topic_text: Yeah sure, what do you need?
topics.response_text: It takes 3 things to make Ultrajet. Two of the ingredients I got plenty of. The other one is a little harder to find: Sugar Bombs.

topics.topic_text: Nothing's free in this world, Murphy.
topics.response_text: Yeah, no kidding. I didn't think you were a freakin' charity.

topics.topic_text: No way. I'm not helping you make chems!
topics.response_text: Fine, fine. Sheesh. Take it easy. You change your mind, gimme a shout.

topics.topic_text: Make it 30 caps each and you got yourself a deal.
topics.response_text: Fine, anything to get what I need. Now scram, I got some preparing to do!
He's my assistant and my backup. In case things get rough. I wouldn't mess with him if I were you.

topics.topic_text: Have you ever heard of The Family?
topics.response_text: Sure. I stay away from them and they don't bother me. It's a good relationship. They live somewhere East of here.

topics.topic_text: Here's all the Sugar Bombs I've got.
topics.response_text: Good... good. There's more out there, so go and find it.
Hmmm, so you wanna live life on the wild side, huh? Okay. Go for it.

topics.topic_text: Let me think about it a bit.
topics.response_text: What is it with you people? Stop thinking so much. That's what got us all here in the first place.
Good. Now get going, I have a ton of preparation to do.
So, what did ya bring me?
Nope. It's 15 each. You wanna do it or what?

conversation.response_text: Yep, do what you gotta do.
You got the stuff, I got the caps. A match made in heaven.

description:
Murphy is a 150 year-old Ghoul Male.

Murphy is a middle-aged ghoul scientist who has established a makeshift laboratory inside the abandoned Northwest Seneca Station. He's known for his expertise in chemistry and his attempts to create Ultrajet, a more potent version of the Jet chem that better affects ghouls.

Murphy's Personality: Pragmatic and resourceful, with a scientist's curiosity and a survivor's mindset. Murphy is focused on his research but understands the need for protection in the wasteland. He's willing to take risks for his experiments but maintains a neutral stance in the broader conflicts of the wasteland.

Murphy's Backstory: Murphy was once a pre-War chemist working for a pharmaceutical company. When the Great War came, he was exposed to massive amounts of radiation while working in a lab, transforming him into a ghoul but miraculously preserving his scientific knowledge. For decades, he wandered the wasteland, honing his skills and searching for resources. Eventually, he discovered Northwest Seneca Station, which provided a relatively secure location to set up his laboratory. There, he began his ambitious project to create Ultrajet, recognizing that regular Jet had diminished effects on ghouls like himself.
